description: Apply High Definition Compatible Digital (HDCD) decoding.
name: hdcd

options.description: Disable any automatic format conversion or resampling in the filter graph.
options.name: disable_autoconvert

options.description: Process the stereo channels together. If target_gain does not match between channels, consider it invalid and use the last valid target_gain.
options.name: process_stereo

options.description: Set the code detect timer period in ms.
options.name: cdt_ms

options.description: Always extend peaks above -3dBFS even if PE isn’t signaled.
options.name: force_pe

choices.help: gain adjustment level at each sample
choices.name: lle

choices.help: samples where the code detect timer is active
choices.name: cdt

choices.help: samples where the target gain does not match between channels
choices.name: tgm

options.description:
Replace audio with a solid tone and adjust the amplitude to signal some specific aspect of the decoding process. The output file can be loaded in an audio editor alongside the original to aid analysis.

analyze_mode=pe:force_pe=true can be used to see all samples above the PE level.

Modes are:

‘0, off’

Disabled

‘1, lle’

Gain adjustment level at each sample

‘2, pe’

Samples where peak extend occurs

‘3, cdt’

Samples where the code detect timer is active

‘4, tgm’

Samples where the target gain does not match between channels
options.name: analyze_mode

options.description: Valid bits per sample (location of the true LSB).
options.name: bits_per_sample
